model.name: LTX Video 0.9.7 13B
model.description: LTX Video is a fast model that can be used to generate long videos (up to 260 frames).It is recommended to keep the number of steps to 30 or you will need to update the file 'ltxv_video/configs/ltxv-13b-0.9.7-dev.yaml'.The LTX Video model expects very long prompts, so don't hesitate to use the Prompt Enhancer.
